Key Match Events: Lautaro Martínez scored twice in the second half to help Argentina beat Peru 2-0.
Argentina finished top of Group A with 9 points, while Peru ended up with 1 point.
Pre-Game Insights: Lautaro Martinez struck twice in the second half to help Argentina's second string beat Peru 2-0 at the Copa América on Saturday and finish top of Group A, knocking Peru out of the tournament.
